about-me.title: About-me
about-me.content1: Hello, I am Guilherme Rodrigues de Morais, a 19-year-old young man passionate about the art of programming. As far back as I can remember, I have always been fascinated by the world of technology and the transformative power of code. Three years ago, I immersed myself headlong into this challenging and stimulating universe, and since then, I have been on a journey of continuous learning and exciting discoveries.
about-me.content2: In addition to my love for technology, I am a sociable and outgoing person. I enjoy spending time with friends and family, sharing laughs and memorable experiences. I believe that it is in these moments of togetherness that we build true bonds and strengthen our support network.

projects.title: My projects
projects.sub-text: Here are some of the projects I ve created. If interested, see more at
projects.project-1: My first project, which wasn't done by following a tutorial or copying from somewhere else. Here was when I truly felt that I was learning.
projects.project-2: A small project where I recreated the famous snake game, where the objective is to move your snake to collect points and make it grow.

techs.title: Tools and Technologies
techs.sub-text: Explore some of the technologies I use in my projects. Each one has its function within a project, so if you feel curious, click on one to go to its website.
